snippet.title: ASHES: AFTERGLOW - Final Trailer
snippet.description:
Final stage of project has begun. Release date is TBC still but within the next month - aiming for late September/early October. Last few touches to maps and art and coding finale is all that is left. Any further news will be announced in the coming days. 


And thank you all once again. I wouldn't be here without all the incredible support this project has received. Many thanks to ReformedJoe for recording the footage and editing it (as well as building much of the architecture you see in the video) and WolfseyeRio for audio work.You can keep up to date with all the work and complain about my terrible ideas on the forum page, here:https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=69612


Reformed Joe also makes some other cool stuff, check him out: https://youtube.com/channel/UC5lT_0Ngvl2hQlll3YFpbjw

John S. Weekley has somehow been persuaded to return to compose the score. He makes some other sick beats here:
https://youtube.com/user/TheWeekle

Retromuffin34 has been making a lot of cool props and textures for me. Keep an eye on this one. That's a hint. She's new to YouTube but show her some love here:
https://youtube.com/channel/UCVlBeu6BACQA1lO6B06E8MA



ASHES: AFTERGLOW is the second episode of a planned series. Based on the Gzdoom source port, for Doom 2.
